definition: orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor

sentences.english: Tom saw that it was his old master, Mr.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆看到那是他的老主人格蘭姆斯先生。

sentences.english: We had dinner at an outdoor fish restaurant called Sallam.
sentences.chinese: 我們在一家名爲“薩蘭姆”的戶外魚鮮餐館用餐。

sentences.english: I said, in that case I'll have a rum and Coca-Cola.
sentences.chinese: 我說在這個情況我會喝杯蘭姆酒加可口可樂。

sentences.english: We compare the results in two used theorv. the Lamb theory and the Haken theory.
sentences.chinese: 並將蘭姆理論結果與哈肯理論結果進行比較。

sentences.english: Rum and translation lamb wine, is molasses distillation wine.
sentences.chinese: 朗姆酒又譯作蘭姆酒，是糖蜜蒸餾酒。

sentences.english: Hot Buttered Rum is a traditional holiday cocktail of rum and sugar.
sentences.chinese: 熱奶油蘭姆酒是甜酒和糖的傳統節日雞尾酒。

sentences.english: The fairy lady appeared and told Grimes that his mother had gone to heaven.
sentences.chinese: 仙女出現了，告訴格蘭姆斯他的媽媽已經上了天堂。

sentences.english: Who had the rum and coke?
Tom saw that it was his old master, Mr. Grimes .
sentences.chinese: 湯姆看到那是他的老主人格蘭姆斯先生。

sentences.english: Graham-Cumming should consider a second volume of nerdy spots.
sentences.chinese: 葛蘭姆康明應該考慮出版第二本怪胎景點。

sentences.english: B. I think you should fire Mr. Mason.
sentences.chinese: 我應該解僱梅森先生還是格蘭姆斯先生？

sentences.english: Mr. Lamb encountered a terrible murder, at all events he was notkilled.
sentences.chinese: 蘭姆先生遭遇到一次可怕的謀殺，但無論如何他沒死。

sentences.english: Perhaps I'm being unfair on Ibrahim.
sentences.chinese: 也許我對伊伯蘭姆不公平。

sentences.english: Profits were to be divided evenly between Mr. Lamb and his parner.
sentences.chinese: 利潤是均勻地分配給蘭姆先生和他的合夥人的。

sentences.english: Lam's study did not address why Internet use might increase the risk of depression.
sentences.chinese: 蘭姆的研究沒有寫爲什麼上網能夠增加抑鬱的風險。

definition: Leonardo da Vinci (1452-1519), Italian Renaissance painter (Tw)
